Class.name: MDX2JSON.Utils
Class.Description:
Utility class, wrappers for processing of MDX queries in MDX2JSON.ResultSet. Outputs JSON, JSONP and XML/A.
Also has functionality for getting information about cubes, dashboards and widgets.

Method.name: GetResultSet
Method.Description:
Transforms MDX query into executed MDX2JSON.ResultSet.
MDX - String containing MDX query.
Status - Status of query execution.
Method.Implementation: set Status = $$$OK set RS = ##class(MDX2JSON.ResultSet).%New() set Status = RS.%PrepareMDX(MDX) return RS

Method.name: GetResultSetFromQuery
Method.Description:
Transforms MDX query into executed MDX2JSON.ResultSet.
MDX - String containing MDX query.
Status - Status of query execution.
Method.Implementation:
set Status = $$$OK set RS = ##class(MDX2JSON.ResultSet).%New() set Status = RS.%PrepareKey(CubeKey, QueryKey) return:$$$ISERR(Status) RS
do:$$$ISOK(Status) RS.%GetQueryText() return RS

Method.name: ExecuteResultSet
WriteJSONfromMDX
Method.Description:
Automatic processing of MDX query and outputting resulting JSON.
MDX - String containing MDX query.
Method.Implementation:
#dim RS As MDX2JSON.ResultSet set RS = ..GetResultSet(MDX, .st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = ..ExecuteResultSet(RS, , Timeout) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set obj = RS.ToProxyObject(.st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st $$$DynObjToJSON(obj)
return $$$OK

Method.name: WriteJSONfromQuery
Method.Description:
Automatic processing of MDX query and outputting resulting JSON.
MDX - String containing MDX query.
Method.Implementation:
#dim RS As MDX2JSON.ResultSet set RS = ..GetResultSetFromQuery(CubeKey, QueryKey, .st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = ..ExecuteResultSet(RS, , Timeout) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set obj = RS.ToProxyObject(.st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st $$$DynObjToJSON(obj)
return $$$OK

Method.name: WriteJSONPfromMDX
Method.Description:
Automatic processing of MDX query and outputting resulting JSONP.
pMDX - String containing MDX query.
Method.Implementation:
set RS = ..GetResultSet(pMDX,.st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ..ExecuteResultSet(RS) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set PageSize = 1000 set CurrPage = 1 set st = RS.%OutputJSON(PageSize,CurrPage,,PageSize) return st

Method.name: WriteJSONfromMDXNew
Method.Description:
Automatic processing of MDX query and outputting resulting JSON.
pMDX - String containing MDX query.
Method.Implementation: #if $$$comClassDefined("%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonMDXProvider") set Provider = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonMDXProvider).%New() set Provider.mdxQuery = pMDX set st = Provider.%DrawJSON() #else set st = $$$ERROR($$$GeneralError,"Class %ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonMDXProvider does not exist") #endif return st

Method.name: WriteDrillthroughJSON
Method.Description:
Automatic processing of MDX Drillthrough query and outputting resulting listing as JSON.
pMDX - String containing MDX Drillthrough query.
Method.Implementation:
set RS = ..GetResultSet(pMDX,.st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ..ExecuteResultSet(RS) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set SQL = RS.%GetListingSQL() do ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonSQLProvider).%WriteJSONFromSQL(,SQL,,$$$MaxCacheInt)
return $$$OK

Method.name: WriteXMLAfromMDX
Method.Description:
Automatic processing of MDX query and outputting resulting XML/A.
pMDX - String containing MDX query.
Method.Implementation:
set RS = ..GetResultSet(pMDX,.st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ..ExecuteResultSet(RS) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = RS.%OutputXMLA()
return st

Method.name: WriteFiltersForMDX
Method.Description:
Gets filters for MDX expression.
pMDX - String containing MDX query.
Method.Implementation:
set RS = ..GetResultSet(pMDX,.st) return:$$$ISERR(st) st set st = ..ExecuteResultSet(RS) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st=RS.%GetFiltersForCellRange(.filters,0,0,RS.%GetAxisSize(2),RS.%GetAxisSize(1),.measure)
return st

Method.name: WriteFiltersForDataSource
Method.Description:
Get all filters for DeepSee DataSource in JSON format.
pDataSource - name of DeepSee datasource (cube, pivot, kpi, metric).
pValues - write all filters' values. Takes time.

Method.name: GetDataSource
Method.Description:
Get information about pivot.
pDataSource - pivot fullName.

Method.name: OpenPivotByName
Method.Description:
Opens DeepSee pivot by it's name. Returns status of atempt to locate and open pivot. PivotName - fullName property of %DeepSee.Dashboard.Pivotn class.
Pivot - OREF to opened dashboard would be passed here upon successfull execution.

Method.name: GetPivotFullName
Method.Description: Get Pivot full name by id

Method.name: GetTermList
Method.Description:
Get information about TermList.
pTermList - TermList full name (eg.: Patients Pivots) without .termlist extension.

Method.name: GetWidgetsList
Method.Description:
Using dashboard name get JSON representation (array of ("type","title","mdx")) of all its' widgets.
pDashName - fullname of dashboard. Eg: "KPIs & Plugins/KPI with Listing.dashboard". Case insensitive.

Method.name: GetDashboard
Method.Description:
Using dashboard name get JSON representation of all its' widgets and filters.
pDashName - fullname of dashboard. Eg: "KPIs & Plugins/KPI with Listing.dashboard". Case insensitive.

Method.name: GetFormat
ExecuteAction
Method.Implementation: set st = $$$OK set Cube = $$$UPPER(Cube) set ActionClass = $G($$$DeepSeeMetaGLVN("cubes",Cube,"actionClass"), $G($$$DeepSeeMetaGLVN("kpis",Cube))) if (ActionClass'="") { set st = $classmethod(ActionClass,"%OnDashboardAction",Action,Context) } return st

Method.name: WritePivotVariablesForCube
Method.Description: Return a list of available pivot variables for <var>Cupe</var>. See correspontding method from DeepSee.REST.v1.InfoServer

Method.name: CreateAddons
CreateAddonClass
Method.Description: Create class for an addon w ##class(MDX2JSON.Utils).CreateAddonClass("DSW.Addon.A")
Method.Implementation:
quit:$$$defClassDefined(Class) $$$OK
set classObj = ##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%New(Class) set classObj.Super = "%DeepSee.Component.Portlet.abstractPortlet" set classObj.GeneratedBy = "MDX2JSON and DeepSeeWeb" set classObj.Description = "Portlet for MDX2JSON and DeepSeeWeb. Autogenerated. Do not edit."
set propertyObj = ##class(%Dictionary.PropertyDefinition).%New(Class _ ":Data") set propertyObj.Type = "%String" do classObj.Properties.Insert(propertyObj)
set parameterOnj = ##class(%Dictionary.ParameterDefinition).%New(Class _ ":USECOMMONDIRECTORY") set parameterOnj.Default = 1 do classObj.Parameters.Insert(parameterOnj)
set methodObj = ##class(%Dictionary.MethodDefinition).%New(Class _ ":%OnGetPortletSettings") set methodObj.ClassMethod = $$$YES set methodObj.FormalSpec = "*pInfo:%List,&pSettings" set methodObj.ReturnType = "%Status" do methodObj.Implementation.Write( $c(9) _ "Kill pInfo" _ $$$NL _ $c(9) _ "Set pInfo = 1" _ $$$NL _ $c(9) _ "Set pInfo(1) = $lb(""Data"", , , ""Data"", ""Data setting"")" _ $$$NL _ $c(9) _ "Quit $$$OK")
do classObj.Methods.Insert(methodObj)
quit classObj.%Save()
